snippet.title: By Your Side — Opening Movie【HD】
snippet.description:
▼Purchase link:
https://takafumi.itch.io/by-your-side

_______________
A short simulation game made by one person in one month. 

​Take control of the unnamed protagonist as she moves into an apartment with her girlfriend. Unlock new clothing, discover new scenes, learn more about this mysterious couple, and most importantly... Enjoy life!
_______________

▼Creator's Twitter account
https://twitter.com/Taka_Sakagami

▼Read about the game's development:
https://kyacchi22.wordpress.com/2019/02/28/nanoreno-by-your-side-day-0/
